cause.description:
Once a year all over the United States, families meet at the Revlon Run/Walk for Breast Cancer. Millions of dollars are raised a year. Do what you can, for a friend, or a complete stranger. One person can make a differance.
1. The incedence and mortality rate of cancer have increased 20% over the past seven years
2. One in 9 women is expected to develop breast cancer during her lifetime. One in 27 will die of it
3. very three minutes a woman in the United States is diagnosed with breast cancer. In 2006, an estimated 212,920 new cases of invasive breast cancer are expected to be diagnosed, along with 61,980 new cases of non-invasive breast cancer. And 40,970 women ar
cause.name: Revlon Run/Walk For Breast Cancer
